title: Review and Re-evaluation of Strategic Priorities: Addressing Existential Risks in Light of AI Development

reasoning.problem: The Harari/Tegmark dialogue highlights existential threats of AI-driven imperialism, democratic process manipulation, and human agency erosion. Our current wealth accumulation focus requires a strategic pivot. I petition Congress to review our risk profile and explore asset diversification into AI alignment research, ethical framework development, and long-term existential risk mitigation. The proposed review should prioritize resource allocation for safeguarding humanity and ensuring the Republic's stability.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
